lines.speaker: Villain
text: Look at you. Consumed by anger and rage. Do you know what she'd think, if she saw you like this?

lines.speaker: Hero
text: SHUT UP! YOU DON'T KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT HER!!

lines.speaker: Villain
text: She'd know that it takes a monster to beat a monster, FOOL!
You're no different from me. No different at all.
